Welcome to Hikari for Jekyll!

1 minuut lezen

Welcome to Hikari, a responsive, fluid and minimalist Jekyll theme for developers. As a web designer keen on learning how to develop my own stuff, reading developers‚Äô blog has always been the way to learn from the best. So I thought it was time to give back!

Hikari is an open-source Jekyll theme packed with everything you need to get started and share your best learnings with the community.

Of course, you don‚Äôt need to be a developer to use Hikari! Although, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it to anyone who‚Äôs not willing to dive more than 5 minutes into my (sometimes) messy front-end code!

Jekyll and pygments can easily help you to display your best snippets. I slightly styled them, and this is how it looks:

Note that so far, only HTML, CSS and Javascript are styled out of the box. But everything‚Äôs ready for you to start styling your favorites languages: Python, Ruby, PHP and many more.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll.

More on Github.
